name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 4
summary: Toaplan Arcade 4 for Evercade brings together 6 more all-action arcade hits from the beloved Japanese developer Toaplan. Blast off for explosive action in the shoot ’em ups Dogyuun and Grind Stormer, enjoy cartoony platform fun in Snow Bros. 2 and Pipi and Bibi’s, and hit the streets in the wrestling-themed beat ’em up Knuckle Bash.
